hero.title: Vittorio Pio Remigio Cozzoli
hero.description:
I am a college student with an educational background full of very heterogeneous experiences, both pragmatical and theoretical ones, which allowed me to put into practice the skills I acquired during my years of education.
Engineeringly speaking, my main interests regard mathematical and biological applications of high performance computing architectures.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A small selection of some personal projects.

items.title: Machine Learning for drug-target interaction estimation in Drug Discovery: from replication to data integration analysis
items.description: Research project concerning the retraining of GenScore, a convolutional neural network designed to calculate the affinity degree (score) between a protein (or a protein pocket) and a ligand with a different dataset.

items.title: Software Engineering Project
items.description: Project regarding the creation from scratch of the board game called “Codex Naturalis”.

items.title: Digital Circuits Project
items.description: Project concerning the creation of a hardware component that solves an assigned problem according to a particular specification.

items.title: Algorithms and Principles of Computer Science Project
items.description: Project concerning the use of advanced algorithms and data structures for the purpose of solving an assigned problem in the lowest possible temporal and spatial complexity.

items.title: Machine Learning for drug-target interaction estimation in Drug Discovery: from replication to data integration analysis
items.description: C/C++ library that implements an equivalent of the "mldivide" MATLAB function for solving systems of linear equations

items.title: “Visionary Days - QualeFuturo” Hackathon
items.description: Member, among only 400 selected throughout whole Italy, of the extraordinary edition of "Visionary Days - QualeFuturo", Web Marathon announced by the Italian Government in collaboration with the QualeFuturo institution, aiming at the creation of a Digital Table to search for proposals and solutions to economic and social problems due to the state of contingency caused by the Coronavirus pandemic.

items.title: “Premio Scuola Digitale 2020”
items.description: National contest announced by the Italian Education Ministry regarding digital, technical, technological and entrepreneurial innovation.

items.title: “Futura Roma” Hackathon
items.description: Competition announced in 2018 by the Italian Ministry of Education, University and Research (MIUR) regarding school and educational innovation.

items.title: "Global YounG7" Hackathon
items.description: Winner of the local Global YounG7 hackathon, a G7 simulation formed by groups of high school students representing the world’s seven greatest economic powers.

items.title: Maker Faire Rome - The European Edition
items.description: Winner of the "Maker of Merit" Award as the best Engineering Project exhibited at the European Technology Fair "Maker Faire Rome", 2017 Edition.
